Cut, copy and paste in Fonto
And you can, but not with the button you clicked. Instead, you can use these keyboard shortcuts:
Use the keyboard shortcut to paste.

Your support team needs to change the configuration of Fonto before we can view this type of document. To help them do this, you can share the technical details below.
The document you tried to open is not where we expected it to be. It may have been moved, renamed or deleted.
Your account doesn’t have the access rights that are needed to open this document.
There seem to be issues in the system where your documents are stored.
This structure of this document is not correct according to its structure rules. Content has to be structured correctly in order to view it in Fonto.
We can’t load the structure rules for this document. These are needed in order to view the document in Fonto.
It may have one or more mistakes in its source code. It could also be of a filetype that we can’t view.
To make sure this error can be fixed as soon as possible, please copy and share the information below with your support team.
{TOTAL_DOCUMENTS, plural, one{# document} other{# documents}} loaded so far…
SDK: {SDK_VERSION}, generated on {DATE, fonto_date}, {DATE, time, short}
We’re sorry. Please contact your support team for further assistance so we can try to get things back on track as quickly as possible.
Fonto was unable to update the interface due to an unexpected error.
Fonto was unable to complete your action due to an unexpected error.
Fonto was unable to save your documents due to an unexpected error.

It may be possible to continue normally. If Fonto starts behaving oddly, try restarting Fonto. If the issue persists, please contact your support team for assistance so we can try to get things back on track as quickly as possible.
This document was edited somewhere else
You can refresh this document to get its latest version, but refreshing it will discard all your unsaved changes. If you want to keep your changes, you can:
Paste your content back into the refreshed document
Refresh this document to get the latest version and start editing.

The CMS returned an error when attempting to lock this document. Please check your connection and retry.
The lock for this document could not be released
The CMS returned an error when attempting to release the lock for this document. Please check your connection and retry releasing the lock, or refresh the document if the error persists.
Only you can edit this document
If you're done editing this document, you can release the lock so others can edit it.
You can't edit this document. It is possibly being edited by someone else, or you don't have the required access rights.
You can refresh the document to see the latest version.

You can refresh this document, but refreshing it will discard all your unsaved changes. If you want to keep your changes, you can:
We have been unable to save your documents for {HOURS, plural, =0 {{MINUTES, plural, =0 {} other {{MINUTES}m }}} other {{HOURS}h {MINUTES}m }}{SECONDS}s.
This may be caused by problems with your network connection, or the CMS may not be responding correctly.
You may continue anyway, however, your changes will not be saved until the problem is resolved.
